clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Irinotecan Liposome in Advanced Pancreatic Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of Irinotecan Liposome in Combination With Oxaliplatin and 5-FU/LV in the Treatment of Advanced Pancreatic Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: To determine the safety and tolerability of irinotecan liposome in combination with oxaliplatin and 5-FU/LV in subjects with advanced pancreatic cancer who have not received prior systemic chemotherapy

primary_outcome.description: Maximum tolerated dose for patients in combination treatment.
Recommended phase II dose for patients in combination treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Frequency and severity of AEs/SAEs as Assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to death; until the data cut off 18 months after the last subject is enrolled. The minimum time in follow up was 18 months.
secondary_outcome.description: Through laboratory test, physical examination, vital signs,12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG), Echocardiogram, etc.;

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to death; until the data cut off 18 months after the last subject is enrolled. The minimum time in follow up was 18 months.
secondary_outcome.description: Number of reported responses (complete [CR] and partial [PR]) divided by the number of reported assessable patients.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to death; until the data cut off 18 months after the last subject is enrolled. The minimum time in follow up was 18 months
secondary_outcome.description: Based on investigator reviewed radiographic tumour assessment and death.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to death; until the data cut off 18 months after the last subject is enrolled. The minimum time in follow up was 18 months.
secondary_outcome.description: Based on investigator reviewed radiographic tumour assessment and death.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to death; until the data cut off 18 months after the last subject is enrolled. The minimum time in follow up was 18 months.
secondary_outcome.description: Based on change in tumour per Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumours (RECIST) 1.1

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose to death; until the data cut off 18 months after the last subject is enrolled. The minimum time in follow up was 18 months.
secondary_outcome.description: Based on investigator reviewed radiographic tumor assessment and death.
area under the plasma concentration versus time curve

arm_group.description: irinotecan liposome: irinotecan liposome injection is irinotecan encapsulated in liposomes for i.v. infusion. oxaliplatin: oxaliplatin is a sterile, aqueous solution; 50mg/vial. 5-FU(Fluorouracil Injection): an aqueous, sterile, nonpyrogenic injectable solution available in 10ml/0.25g. LV(Calcium Folinate Injection): be supplied in vials containing 10ml/0.1g and available as an injectable solution.

intervention.description: irinotecan liposome in combination with oxaliplatin and 5-FU/LV
